summary: App that lists all English alphabet letters (A–Z) and includes an additional page to list words related to the letter A.

existing_features.title: Build a single-page UI that lists all 26 English alphabet letters (A–Z) in order.
Present the alphabet list in a clean, responsive layout suitable for both mobile and desktop (e.g., a grid of letter cards/tiles that reflows based on screen size).
Apply a cohesive visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) with a distinct style; avoid blue-and-purple as the primary palette.
Add a new page to the frontend that lists words related to the English alphabet letter “A”, and make it reachable from the existing A–Z alphabet page.
Populate the “A words” page with a static, curated list of English words that start with the letter “A” (no external API calls).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build an app that displays/list all English alphabet letters (A–Z).
Add an additional page that lists all words related to the letter 'A' (A alphabet).
